Headline: #75 74th-75thTemporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/South Shore
ShortDescription: Westbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Berwyn
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Berwyn due to a medical emergency on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Berwyn due to a medical emergency on the tracks. 

Shuttle buses are available from Howard to Belmont to provide connecting service in both directions.

At this time also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#36 Broadway

#151 Sheridan

#84 Peterson

#92 Foster

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
